channel.title: How do I make a ::restattack command?

item.title: How do I make a ::restattack command?
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:6, topic:333061”] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resetatt") && donator >= 1) { playerXP[0] = 0; getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]); updateRequired = true; sM("You have reset your attack"); }[/quote]

It works thank you so much

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a ::restattack command?

item.title: How do I make a ::restattack command?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resetatt") && donator >= 1) { playerXP[0] = 0; getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]); updateRequired = true; sM("You have reset your attack"); }

item.title: How do I make a ::restattack command?
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“resetatk”)) {
if(playerXP[0] > 10000){sM(“Your attack is not low enough to be considered glitched!”);return;}
for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
int item = playerEquipment[r];
if((item > 0) && (item < 19999)) {sM(“Please remove ALL armor and weapons before using this command!”);return;}
}
this is my ::resetatk command hope it works

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a ::restattack command?

item.title: How do I make a ::restattack command?
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

I was making this code but it’s not helping

It does remove the exp, but it gives them 200m cause it went below 0.

So, I need some help from anyone who knows how to make a reset skill command.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resetatt") && donator >= 1) { addSkillXP(-1000000, 0); addSkillXP(1000000, 0); sM("You have reset your attack"); }

This is for my latest product, if your a great coder you may join as well…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a ::restattack command?
